metadata.title: CVE-2023-31606 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) issue was discovered in thesanitize_html function of redcloth gem v4.0.0. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a craftedpayload.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31606` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-redcloth - 4.3.2-4ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-4ubuntu0.22.04.1').
